New Records: Jackson Chourio became the first player in Major League history to hit 20 homers and record 20 stolen bases before turning 21.
Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio led off the ninth inning against the Philadelphia Phillies with a triple and eventually scored the winning run on Jake Bauers' single for a 2-1 victory.
The Brewers clinched the National League Central earlier in the day when the Chicago Cubs fell to Oakland, but the walk-off win was icing on the cake.
